items.content_html: EasyTracker – Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.

Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.

items.content_html: # cf-worker-telegramA lightweight Cloudflare Worker that serves as a proxy for the Telegram Bot API. 🌐 This tool helps you navigate network restrictions and streamline your Telegram bot applications. 🛠️## Features- Supports all Telegram Bot API methods- Full CORS support for web applications- High performance with Cloudflare's global networ

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨
items.title: thegamer49520/timeout-typescript: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨

items.content_html: A lightweight, serverless Telegram bot built with AWS Lambda, OpenAI Assistants API, and Node.js. It processes a simple webhook message, interacts with OpenAI to generate a response, and sends it back via Telegram.
items.title: v-kyrychenko/ka4-today-bot: A lightweight, serverless Telegram bot built with AWS Lambda, OpenAI Assistants API, and Node.js.   It processes a simple webhook message, interacts with OpenAI to generate a response, and sends it back via Telegram.

items.content_html: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
items.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
